Articles.Content: Hello, I was trying to create an action group that would allow me to fire a missile. My goal was to activate an engine then decouple the node it was attached to however, It always decouples first and as a result the engine doesn't fire. How do I get the engine to fire before the node detaches?
If you want the engine to fire before you decouple it, you can set it to two action groups and set them off in quick succession.

I tried this a while ago, decoupling and firing the engines (sepratrons if i recall correcly) with the same action group worked fine. But you can't control something if it's decoupled and does'nt have a command pod (you'd have to switch to it anyway).

Anyway, welcome aboard!
